name: TAZERACE
description:
Created in 48hrs for the GMTK jam 2020. 13/07/2020

Navigate a puzzle platformer level laden with tazers in a tempermental hovercraft. 

- 1 to quicksave
- 2 to quickload
- Mouse controls direction
- A, D for roll
- W, S for thrust

I ran out of time making this one, I would have liked more of a level, better sound design, a story and all that but I guess I just had too much darn fun coding the physics for the hover-car. I don't really expect to win any prizes or anything with this one, It was fun getting the chance to show one of my major inspirations/mentors my second released game.
Enjoy!
